data.title: Manufacturing electric vehicles
data.meta_description: Workhorse manufactures electric trucks and drones for zero-emission last mile delivery. All-Electric Solutions Designed for People Who Get Things Done.
data.text:
ELECTRIFYING LAST MILE DELIVERY

All-Electric Solutions Designed for

People Who Get Things Done.

WORKHORSE

Changing Work

for Good

We build dependable zero-emission vehicles for all types of work. Made with durable EV components and intuitive technical features, our trucks and drones are engineered to make every job smarter, safer, and more productive than before.

Our fleet is designed to help you handle today’s needs with an eye on tomorrow’s demands.

Workhorse by the Numbers

Over

9.5M

Miles Driven

by Workhorse all-electric vehicles

Save over

$7k

Per Year in Operating Costs*

for a medium-duty electric truck vs. an ICE truck

Drive up to

150

Miles**

on a single charge in a Workhorse all-electric work truck

Over

300k

Square Feet

of manufacturing facilities in the USA

Swipe left

Zero Emissions,

Endless Flexibility

Lead the way in electrifying last mile delivery with a ready-to-roll fleet loaded with plenty of options and configurations.

Meet Our Fleet

Whether you’re looking for a single vehicle or building a fully integrated fleet, Workhorse has what you need to get the job done.

Endlessly customized to fit your needs.

A durable work truck that you can depend on.

Comfortable, capable, and ready to work.

“The shift to electrification in the automotive industry is a generational change. Here at Workhorse, we’re excited to be one of the pioneers on the commercial side of the equation. We’re committed to make sure we have the best, safest electric vehicles out on the marketplace for last-mile delivery.”

Rick Dauch

Chief Executive Officer

Ready to Take the Next Step?

Reach out to discover how Workhorse’s dependable, all-electric fleet can work for you.
